Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located at the intersection of Topsail Road and Blackmarsh Road- minutes from the new Gushue extension. This 1500 sf unit is currently a professional services office who are in place until October 31. Building has maintained long term tenants and offers an exceptional lease rate. Currently a professional services offices, this building suits retail, office and professional services. Tenant pays business tax additional to City of Mount Pearl.
Located at 1090 Topsail Road this opportunity offers modern office space with convenient access to the TCH, Kenmount Road, and the Team Gushue Highway.

Located at 1090 Topsail Road this property offers modern office space with convenient access to the TCH, Kenmount Road, and the Team Gushue Highway. There is 3,600 SF of modern office space available on the third floor with elevator access in this secured building.Take advantage of the ideal blend of open concept workspace, private office and meeting rooms with high end finishes throughout. The space contains a modern kitchenette and has office furniture available.

Located in Donovan's Business Park this 8,000 SF building is a mix of office/warehouse with paved parking. Warehouse ceiling height is 16' and there are 2 grade doors. Office portion consists of private offices and open work space, reception area, boardroom and washrooms.

Located in Donovan's Business Park this 8,000 SF building is a mix of office/warehouse with paved parking. Warehouse ceiling height is 16' and there are 2 grade doors. Office portion consists of private offices and open work space, reception area, boardroom and washrooms. Landlord willing to subdivide.
